text: Office Romance () is a 1977 Russian comedy movie directed by Eldar Ryazanov and was based on the play Co-Workers by Ryazanov. It stars Andrey Myagkov, Alisa Freindlich, Oleg Basilashvili, Georgi Burkov, Pytor Shcherbakov and was distributed by Mosfilm. ==Other websites== * * Category:1977 comedy movies Category:Russian comedy movies Category:Movies based on plays Category:Movies directed by Eldar Ryazanov
title: Office Romance
